page.title: 10SCHOOL SURVEY
page.content: We asked the 46 children in the top two classes about how they live. Questions were about{pocket money, {leisure activities, pets, houses, {shopping}and{consumer goods. 83% of the children receive{pocket {money.}Most get between 50p and Â£1.50. In our{free time}we like to play with friends and watch television. Favourite{hobbies}are swimming, fishing and reading. 85% have{pets,}mostly cats and dogs. All the others would like a pet. We asked what sort of{houses}people live in. 37% have detached houses, 48% semi-detached and 15% terraced houses. {Food shopping}is done mainly in Swadlincote but for clothes and toys people prefer to go to Burton-on-Trent or Derby.
